name: BMX Boss Flip
description:
Become the best rider on the halfpipe! Jump at full speed and pull off amazing tricks!
Collect all the characters and locations. BMX has never been more fun!

Are you ready to beat the high score and become the best rider?

Unlock all the characters! Each character has its own stats. Better characters will go faster and higher, also they will get more points and earn more coins.

Unlock all the tricks! More difficult tricks will get you more points!

Unlock cool locations! Don’t ride always in the same place.

Quick and simple gameplay. Make flips and spins with the left buttons or joystick, make tricks with the right buttons. That’s it!

Download it now! You can play offline!
